description: Caffè di Alpi, also known as Alpine Coffee, is the perfect drink to kick off your next cocktail party. Whether warm,&nbsp;frozen, or cold, it takes only a few minutes to make and pairs perfectly with cinnamon raisin bread.Made with coffee liqueur, amaretto, and&nbsp;bourbon, it is the ideal blend of sweet and strong. So go ahead and impress your guests with this unique and delicious drink!
name: Caffè Di Alpi

recipeInstructions.name: Coat a warmed mug with honey and add the hot brewed coffee and bourbon.
